alert.note: Alert for Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Orange; Osceola; Seminole; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 09 at 3:33AM EDT until April 09 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...HIGH FIRE WEATHER DANGER THIS AFTERNOON... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH CONTINUES TODAY FROM 12 NOON TO 8 PM THIS EVENING FOR THE COMBINATION OF GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY, BUT HIGHER GROUND MOISTURE THAN AREAS FARTHER SOUTH... * AFFECTED AREA...Orange, Seminole, Osceola, Okeechobee, Brevard,Indian River, Saint Lucie, and Martin Counties. * WIND...West around 20 mph with gusts to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...Minimum values of 30 to 35 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
